name: Environmental Investment Partners
tag_list: cleantech, renewable-energy, solar, wind, waste-water, sustainable-energy, recycling, emerging-markets, esg, central-europe, poland
overview:
This US based investment company was created to invest in early stage Central European environmental projects (such as solar, wind, waste water, solid & liquid wastes, sustainable energy and recycling), and companies operating sustainably in all sectors of the economy (clean technology).

EIP III’s target investees usually have at least 2 years of operating experience and management with a strong track record of success and profitability. Given its focus on early stage and central European investments the EIP III investment company will invest â‚¬ 0.1 mm to â‚¬ 1.0 mm per project. EIP III often seeks local co-investors to invest alongside it for similar amounts.

milestones.description: Environmental Investment Partners and EFICOM create Green Assets Inwestycje, a Poland-focused cleantech and RES capital provider and business incubator.
Environmental Investment Partners and Greenfield Wind announce the completion of a EUR 1MM round from EIP III and private investors.
Environmental Investment Partners Received Central European Pioneer Award by Cleantech Venture Network LLC in a ceremony in New York City.
